Variable¶

class biosteam.evaluation.Variable[source]¶

Abstract class for a variable in BioSTEAM.

name¶

Name of variable

Type

str

element¶

Element corresponding to variable

Type

object

units¶

Units of measure

Type

str

distribution¶

Distribution of variable

Type

chaospy.Dist, optional

describe(number_format='.3g') → str[source]¶

Return description of variable.
